miniDepositTips: if you send any other crypto except {0} to this address, you'll lose your assets.
reminderText: Please select the same network where you are withdrawing from. Otherwise, you'll lose your asset
networkTipsText: Network is the path for crypto transfer between wallets and most cryptos have more than one network selections.
withdrawReminderText: Make sure you select the same network for this withdrawal as the one on deposit side, and check that the receiving platform supports the network. Otherwise, you'll lose your assets.
withdrawSucceededTips: The withdrawal has been completed. Please check {0} account balance for more details.
withdrawAddressTips: The address does not match the selected network, please switch the network
withdrawPenddingTips: The withdrawal is being processed and waiting for block confirmation. Please wait for a moment.
withdrawFailedTips: The withdrawal failed. If you have any questions, please contact our customer service: support{'@'}stellapay.io
withdrawFrozenTips: For the safety of your assets, the withdrawal has been frozen. If you have any questions, please contact our customer service: support{'@'}stellapay.io.
depositSucceededTips: The deposit has been completed. Please check the {0} account balance for more details.
depositPenddingTips: The deposit is being processed and waiting for block confirmation. Please wait for a moment.
depositFailedTips: The deposit failed. If you have any questions, please contact our customer service: support{'@'}stellapay.io.
depositFrozenTips: For the safety of your assets, the deposit has been frozen. If you have any questions, please contact our customer service: support{'@'}stellapay.io.
walletWasFrozen: This wallet has been frozen and the feature cannot be used. please contact customer service if you have any questions.
noAssetNetworkTips: Sorry, this crypto does not support deposit at the moment. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
withdrawNoAssetNetworkTips: Sorry, this crypto does not support withdrawal at the moment. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
assetEmptyTips: No crypto can be withdrawnï¼ŒPlease deposit first
bonusTips: This reward amount can only be used to top-up to cards.
